description:
A Keronian from many generations ago wakes up from a long hibernation in his spaceship after crash-landing on Earth.  He`s disgusted with the Keroro Platoon for not having invaded yet, but he has a secret weapon in his possession that might make a difference.  It might be more dangerous than he realizes, though!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: オノノ 幻のケロン兵
